item.title: CVE-2024-31929|2024-04-11T12:26:47.098Z -- Polevaultweb -- Intagrate Lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Polevaultweb Intagrate Lite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Intagrate Lite: from n/a through 1.3.7.
